>What's wrong?

Axis appears not to want to be initialized twice=
 in the same JVM. In my opinion, Axis has a bug. They likely would not agre=
e with that assessment.

You may need to change your tests (or production c=
ode!) so that Axis is not initialized more than once while the application =
is running.
